_json.gridTitle: Connecting with your Child When You're Feeling Angry
_json.description: How to Connect with your Child Even When You're Feeling Angry ||  We talk a lot about connecting with our little ones through creating - those wonderful, feel-good times of connection. But what about the other times? Those times of connection that can come when it seems everything else is coming apart at the seams? Those unexpected times of connection. This is a story of a lasting connection found amidst the hustle, bustle, stress, and anger of one particularly busy day.
